name: Rhombus Multi Purpose Dashboard UI Kit
description:
A Multi Purpose Dashboard UI Kit (Free Sample)


Overview

Rhombus is a modern, minimalist, and easy to use dashboard UI Kit for multi-projects. It contains 90+ pre-made dashboard design in 9 categories. The product made from scratch with Sketch and Figma.


Main Features

  • 90+ Pre-made Screens
  • Mobile Screens Available
  • Fully Customizable
  • Drag and Drop Ready
  • Global Styleguide
  • Clean & Unique Design
  • Google Fonts
  • Available in Figma & Sketch


Screen Categories

All pre-made screens inside the product divided into 9 categories:

  • Fintech App (10 Screens)
  • Point of Sales (10 Screens)
  • CRM (6 Screens)
  • Job Search (6 Screens)
  • Social Media (10 Screens)
  • Social Streaming App (9 Screens)
  • Dashboard Onboarding (15 Screens)
  • Misc Pages (10 Screens)
  • Authentication Page (14 Screens)
  • +Master Styleguide
